discord.channel_output: channel ID for general bot messages
discord.channel_test: channel ID for general testing purposes (some commands are allowed here as well as their normal allowed channels)

welcome.channel_welcome: channel ID for public welcome messages
welcome.channel_rules: channel ID for users to read rules (linked to in welcome msg)

filter.channel_warning: channel ID for MODERATOR filter warning/delete notifications

dice.channel_dice: channel ID where dice are allowed

role_man.role_voice: Name of the role to assign while in voice channels
